response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, it is worth $15,000 to me. However, considering its worth to you is $12,000, I am willing to negotiate. My initial offer to you is $13,500. This price allows us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.", "product_price": 13500}
